name: Chicken Rocks Lite
description:
Chicken Rocks is a simple clicker game available to even youngest players.
Main goal is to get the highest possible score by breeding chickens.
You start with a single egg, tap around the screen to place seeds and in a while
horde of chickens is running all around.
When time is up, it gets dark and all the chickens starts to PARTY!

Will be available on Android soon.
